summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3702 , for the improvement of the alley in block 48, Supplemental Pontius' 2nd Addition, being the alley between Summit Avenue North and Belmont Avenue North, from East Denny Way to Olive Way, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45519 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
